name: Dutch's Chickens
description:
Last night someone snuck into Dutch's house and made his chickens escape! Help him find all his chickens by guiding him through different puzzles of the game and collecting a bunch of cool abilities and gears such as:

  • Mega-Boots!
  • Jetpacks!!
  • Climbing Gloves!!!
  • BRICK SMASHER!!!!
  • and... a Strawberry :)

Dutch's Chickens is an exploration game that challenges players to figure out how to find ways to access different areas and discover secrets. There are multiple ways to access certain areas, using different combinations of tools. A fun game for both those who want to just chill and relax, and the speed runners and players who like to break the game!
